oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded on May 27, 2003 with Ṣādiq Bakīr ‘Annān, male, born in 1910 in Gaza, Palestine. He was a trader.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع صادق بكير عنان في 27 أيار مايو عام 2003، ذكر، ولد عام 1910 في غزة، فلسطين. كان تاجرًا
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Economic conditions during the British rule. (@ 18:25)
Political turmoil, revolutionaries and military activity . (@ 54:57)
